title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an economic stimulus for individuals.
content: Family Economic Stimulus Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) exclude unemployment compensation from gross income in 2007 and 2008, (2) increase the child tax credit to $1,200 in 2008, (3) allow individual taxpayers a $400 tax rebate in 2008, (4) extend unemployment insurance benefits. And (5) require states to distribute to unemployed individuals information about unemployment insurance eligibility conditions.
